Reviews.Title: Cute and Simple
Reviews.Author: oculv21
Reviews.Content: This camera is fun to use, cute, and portable. I love that I don't have to keep using batteries like I do with my other cameras. I also enjoy manually winding and rewinding the film. But on the other hand I can't find the battery for the flash (like it's not sold anywhere..), so I've never used the flash. Also, it looks a little too simple and fun because people have thought that it's a toy camera and make fun of it (definitely pissed about that). And it's difficult to get pictures to turn out the right way, many were blurry or overexposed (in a bad way). The viewfinder doesn't look the way the pictures will. Long exposures look amazing. The multiple exposures look awesome, although I don't always get that method right. All in all, I would recommend this camera to someone who loves antiques or simplicity.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Francoliver
Reviews.Content: EVERYTHING WONDERFUL ! THANKSENTREGA PROMETIDA NO PRAZO, EXCELENTE PRODUTO, BLA BLA BLA.. NÃO TENHO MAIS O QUE DIZER, FOI TUDO PERFEITO BOA NOITE AMOR.

ProductInfo.Features:
Wide-Angle Lens
Rewind Dial that makes multiple exposures easier
Fritz the Blitz Flash attachment
Film cartridge window on the rear of camera
Easy-to-use focusing with two simple settings
ProductInfo.Name: Lomography Cubic Camera
